articles.author: Doyle Rice, USA TODAY
articles.title: Heat wave forecast: Excessive heat warnings affect 85M Americans - USA TODAY
articles.description: More than 85 million Americans live where heat alerts were in effect Friday, the start of an 'oppressive' and 'dangerous' weekend for hot weather.
articles.content:
Intense summer heat is in full swing across the U.S. and many are in for another round of sweltering temperatures this weekend. 
The forecast: "Oppressive and extreme summer heat will produce danger… [+3213 chars]
